meanings.definition: Convert (an image or graphic) into pixels for display on a screen.
meanings.sent1: She was rasterising the picture to show it on the computer.
meanings.sent2: The designer spent hours rasterising the logo for the website.
meanings.sent3: When the artist tried rasterising the painting, it looked like a bunch of tiny squares!
meanings.sent4: The process of rasterising the image transformed it into a digital mosaic.
meanings.sent5: Rasterising the photo made each detail sharp and clear on the monitor.

meanings.definition: The process of converting vector graphics into raster graphics.
meanings.sent1: The rasterising of the design enhanced its quality for printing.
meanings.sent2: During the rasterising, the image lost its scalability but gained detail.
meanings.sent3: The sudden rasterising of the illustration surprised the graphic designer.
meanings.sent4: The rasterising of the logo turned it into a fixed-size image.
meanings.sent5: The artist's rasterising of the artwork made it suitable for digital use.
